name: Would You Rather
description: Would You Rather is a conversation or party game that poses a dilemma in the form of a question beginning with 'would you rather'. The dilemma can be between two supposedly good options, two bad options, or two options that are just thought-provoking.
basicRules: One person asks a 'Would you rather...' question to the group.
Each person takes a turn to answer the question and explain their reasoning.
There are no right or wrong answers, the goal is to have fun and get to know each other.
The game can be played with a set of pre-written questions, or players can make up their own questions.
tips: Listen to other people's answers and ask follow-up questions.
Keep the questions light-hearted and fun.
